DOC.brief_summary: TO ASSESS THE EFFICACY OF THE RENIN ANGIOTENSIN SYSTEM PLUS STEROIDS TO DECREASE THE AMOUNT OF PROTEINURIA IN IGA NEPHROPATHY
DOC.brief_title: Inhibition of the Renin Angiotensin System Plus Corticosteroids for the Treatment of Proteinuria in IGA Nephropathy
DOC.detailed_description: Patients whose proteinuria was > 0.5 g/day were to receive enalapril plus valsartan coupled with oral 0.5 g/day of methylprednisone for 6 months.
DOC.criteria: PATIENTES WITH IGA NEPHROPATHY WITH PROTEINURIA OVER 0.5 G/DAY MALIGNANCY, RENAL FAILURE
